# Q008 Climate Change Essay
^question Q008
^type essay
^identifier ES_Q001
^title Climate Change Essay
^points 10
^labels #Environment #ClimateChange #Create #Hard

@field: question_text
Write an essay discussing the main causes and effects of climate change. Your essay should include:
- At least three causes
- At least three effects
- Potential solutions
@end_field

@field: editor_config
^Initial_lines 15
^Show_word_count Yes
^Max_words 1000
^Editor_prompt Write your essay here...
^Editor_toolbar default
@end_field

@field: scoring_rubric
| Points | Criteria |
|--------|----------|
| 10 | Excellent analysis with causes, effects, and solutions |
| 7 | Good analysis covering most points |
| 4 | Basic analysis with some points covered |
| 0 | Missing or off-topic |
@end_field

@field: feedback

@@field: general_feedback
A complete essay should discuss greenhouse gas emissions, deforestation, industrial pollution as causes; rising temperatures, extreme weather, sea level rise as effects; and renewable energy, conservation, policy changes as solutions.
@@end_field

@@field: answered_feedback
Your essay has been submitted for review.
@@end_field

@@field: unanswered_feedback
Please write your essay.
@@end_field

@end_field
